Draft Rating:

D+

John Paxson ranks in the 35th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Paxson's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 4 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Joakim Noah with 9th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Derrick Rose with 1th pick but was worth 7th pick.
  • Drafted Ben Gordon with 3th pick but was worth 34th pick.
  • Drafted Kirk Hinrich with 7th pick but was worth 11th pick.

Trade Rating:

F

John Paxson ranks in the 17th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Luol Deng to CHI.
  • Lost Jackson Vroman, Nate Robinson to PHO.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Viktor Khryapa, Tyrus Thomas to CHI.
  • Lost LaMarcus Aldridge, Demetris Nichols to POR.

Signing Rating:

F

Their worst signings:
